name: St. Giles Living Centers, Inc.
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: St. Giles Living Centers, Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Fort Worth, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $64.1M in Medicaid payments across 564K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $64.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
